review: its is finished fsdfs finally
always love the broken sword series just not the 3d version ones tho

interesting adventure game  bunch of puzzles to solve with a decent hint mechanism  you are on rails here and some of the puzzles are a bit obtuse but you can get hints when required  there is one particular puzzle the wheels which is tedious but that didnt last too long  fun  disclaimer  picked this up for ridiculously cheap on sale  i would have been disappointed if i paid more
it was a good game when i played it 20 years ago it is still good
a classic game everyone should play the riddles can be solved most of the time using common sense the game play is very easy the graphics are great the audio is interesting and the dialogs spiritual
its okay
one word  brilliant

this is an ok remaster most everything has been given a facelift without actually reworking the assets like they did in broken sword reforged i feel they couldve done more but its serviceable for what it is the game itself remains a good one and is emblematic of the 90s pointnclick adventure game genre with all its pros and cons

this was my first broken sword and wont be the last it has a really funny script and great animation for an older game  the characters are are all wellcharacters that leave an impression on you some puzzles are a bit frustrating but a quick look at a walkthrough solves them most are logical enough these days im a bit jaded by modern gaming so this was a breath of fresh air

not as good as the first game however it has better pacing the puzzles and story are a bit simple and have solutions which are convoluted and not as clear as the first game additionally this one has a much shorter story but it has charm to it
classic broken sword sequel i really enjoyed the setting and characters
the broken sword series will always be one of my alltime favourites  great remaster

this was the first game in my life  so glad it got remastered along with the first game if you get to these do yourself a favor  have patience and do not look up a walkthrough for every hickup the moment you solve something by yourself is much cooler than just following a guide

bbroken sword 2  the smoking mirror remasteredb is a fantastic update to the classic pointandclick adventure game that delivers a captivating experience for both new and returning players with enhanced visuals engaging puzzles and a gripping storyline this remastered version breathes new life into the beloved title if youre a fan of immersive storytelling intriguing mysteries and challenging puzzles this game is a must play that will keep you entertained from start to finish

fantastic game a very forgiving point and click adventure with always a way foward
